message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn, Alice. I'm feeling more generous than 60-40, how about this split?
Come on, Bob! 58-42 is as fair as it gets!
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. Meet me in the middle - it'll be better for both of us before inflation eats away any more!
Bob, you're getting closer, but I think I can do a bit better. How about 56-44?
